body_html:
This is a really old torch model.
A fix would be to load it in LuaTorch and save it back. Then the issue should be fixed.
So:

$ th -lnn
> m = torch.load("nn4.small2.v1.t7")
> torch.save("nn4.small2.v1.t7", m)
body_text:
This is a really old torch model.
A fix would be to load it in LuaTorch and save it back. Then the issue should be fixed.
So:
$ th -lnn
> m = torch.load("nn4.small2.v1.t7")
> torch.save("nn4.small2.v1.t7", m)
body:
This is a really old torch model.
A fix would be to load it in LuaTorch and save it back. Then the issue should be fixed.
So:
```
$ th -lnn
> m = torch.load("nn4.small2.v1.t7")
> torch.save("nn4.small2.v1.t7", m)
```
